alert.note: Alert for Addison; Chittenden; Franklin; Lamoille; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 6:22PM EDT until July 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAMOILLE...NORTH CENTRAL ADDISON...EASTERN CHITTENDEN...NORTHERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 618 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bolton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public reported trees down near Williston with this storm. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Vergennes, Montpelier, Morrisville, Johnson Village, Calais, Cambridge, Monkton Ridge, Waterbury Village, Monkton, Westford, Monkton Boro, Williston, Worcester, Middlesex, Hinesburg, St. George, Morrisville Village, Woodbury, Moretown, and Starksboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
